attributes.additional_details: Because its not the dogs that are at fault its the other end of the lead . These dogs deserve to be here as much as any of us they are not dangerous if they are brought up properly if the owner can't control the dog then it should be the owner prosecuted not the dog its not the dogs fault there are no dangerous dogs just dangerous owners
attributes.background: Dogs no matter if they are big or small are not the problem its the owners we don't want any more dogs banned we also want to appeal the all dogs from dangerous dogs act

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509
